title: Autism screening and diagnostic outcomes among toddlers born preterm
details: T Hamner, GP Liz, K Kelly, S Nanovic, R Turchi, D Fein… - … medicine and child …, 2024
abstract: Aim To examine the Modified Checklist for Autism in Toddlers, Revised, with Follow- Up (M-CHAT-R/F), with follow-up screening and diagnostic outcomes for children born preterm. A secondary aim was to examine diagnostic evaluation attendance …
